title: New: Amy Milner – Help
body:
One of the finest voices to emerge from the past few years, **Amy Milner**, has just released her second track, in the form of the exquisite _Help_.

Accompanied by some silky smoothy production, and a heartbreaking sense of despair in her songwriting, it’s one of the most emotionally poignant tracks you’ll hear this year.

_I can’t talk to anyone / if I can’t talk to you_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
